## GitDocumentDB.loadAuthor() method

Load author from .git/config

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadAuthor(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

Load user.name and user.email to GitDocumentDB\#author. If not defined in .git/config, do nothing.
